alert.note: Alert for Antelope (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 7:42PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Antelope County through 800 PM CDT... At 742 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles north of Neligh, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rural areas of the mentioned county. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
